title: Longbeard Orc slayer, the new gandalf for khazad dum?!?

comments.content: So, tonight, as 3 of us played into the pit, when we had several enemies against us and in the staging area, I sneak attacked with Longbeard Orc slayer and the the next round paid to put him in full.  Every Orc, which was every enemy in play got two damage in less than a round, and many went bye-bye!!!  Wished I had him in for the second game when we did the seventh level and got overrun in stage 2b.
Yep, he's a nice little orc-slayer ;) [//content.invisioncic.com/Mfantflight/emoticons/default_wink.png]
Also, Thalin plus Longbeard Orcslayer equals a good time.

I know, it's really cool to see old cards find renewed usefullness!

Also, Thalin plus Gondorian Spearman = Awesome
